I have a consumable "The Star", which has potential later, but can't do anything for me right now.

My immediate goal is to improve the deck for Ante 4. My current focus is scaling the High Card. I need to spend the money and improve my scoring potential.

# Available Commands
The possible commands in Balatro are all composed of a single word specifying the action, followed by any necessary positional arguments, which are lists of integers.
Note: all position arguments are 1-indexed.

The following commands are available in your current game state.
use_consumable <consumeable_position> <target_card_position1> <target_card_position2> ... <target_card_positionN> - Use a consumeable from the consumeables section. The first position argument is the position within your consumables inventory of the consumable you'd like to use. Subsequent position arguments specify the cards in hand that the consumeable will be used on, if that consumeable requires targets.
sell_consumable <consumeable_position> - Sell a consumeable from the consumeables section.
rearrange_jokers <joker1> <joker2> ... <jokerN> - Rearrange the list of currently owned jokers. Every index in the list of current jokers must be present, i.e. if there are 5 jokers, the indices 1-5 must be present.
sell_joker <joker_position> - Sell a joker from the jokers section.
buy_card <card_position> - Buy a card from the card section. Individual Joker cards are also bought from the card section.
buy_booster <booster_pack_position> - Buy a booster pack from the booster pack section.
buy_voucher <voucher_position> - Buy a voucher from the voucher section.
buy_and_use_consumable <consumable_position> - Buy a consumable type card (Tarot, Planet, Spectral) from the card section and use it immediately. Cannot do this if the consumable requires target hand cards.
round_select - Finish shopping and go to the round select screen.
reroll_shop - Spends the reroll cost to reroll the cards section of the shop.

**Current Game State Analysis and Decision**

Okay, here's the situation. It's Ante 4, Round 8. I'm in the SHOP phase. I'm down -$7, but my credit card limit is -$20, so I have some wiggle room. My primary goal is to win this Ante. I'm running a High Card strategy, with Ride the Bus being my main multiplier (currently at +24). I want to continue this playstyle!

My Jokers are: Ride the Bus, Acrobat, Midas Mask, Greedy Joker, and Credit Card.

Initially, I had a strategic conflict in mind with Midas Mask and Ride the Bus. Ride the Bus doesn't want face cards, but Midas Mask wants to score face cards. But, I remember that the secondary description of Midas Mask is a typo or some variant, which isn't the standard effect of turning face cards to gold when scored. The true function is to make face cards Gold *when scored*. But I don't want to break my Ride the Bus streak, so I won't play face cards and will avoid triggering Midas Mask.

I have a Jumbo Standard Pack available for $6, and Seed Money for $10. I'm currently leaning towards the pack. Since I'm running High Card (non-face cards), adding to the deck with low-rank cards or Diamonds is ideal. The pack could contain a card with an enhancement or just a useful rank/suit. I've got $13 of credit left, so this is within my limit.

However, I'm thinking about the order of Jokers. Greedy Joker should be to the left of Acrobat for the multiplier bonuses. But, re-reading the rules, Greedy Joker (On Scored) happens *before* Acrobat (Independent). So the order doesn't matter, and the current joker order is good.

I have -$7, but I can go -$13.

My action will be to `buy_booster 1`, I'm going to add a card to my deck and hope it helps! I've confirmed that this is my most effective action. I want to keep moving.
